name: Nanotwitter
tagline: A scaled implementation of basic Twitter functionality in Ruby.
body:
### Welcome to Nanotwitter.
nanoTwitter(nT) is a project for the class CS105b - Software Engineering for Scalability at Brandeis Univerisity.
It is a baby version of Twitter designed for the purpose of experimenting with scaling issues.

Our project is currently performing the best in our class under load testing with loader.io.
